body_html:
I think it is the default location for libcudnn.so.7
…
On Sun, Sep 16, 2018 at 10:39 AM KUROYANAGI KEIICHI < ***@***.***> wrote: @tedyu <https://github.com/tedyu> @mysticaltech <https://github.com/mysticaltech> I found libcudnn.so.7 in /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu. Do you know why it will be installed there? ***@***.*** /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu ‹system› ╰─$ pwd 02:32:15 /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu ***@***.*** /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu ‹system› ╰─$ ls libcudnn.so.7 02:32:26 libcudnn.so.7@ — You are receiving this because you were mentioned. body_text:
I think it is the default location for libcudnn.so.7
…
On Sun, Sep 16, 2018 at 10:39 AM KUROYANAGI KEIICHI < ***@***.***> wrote:
 @tedyu <https://github.com/tedyu> @mysticaltech
 <https://github.com/mysticaltech> I found libcudnn.so.7 in
 /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu. Do you know why it will be installed there?

 ***@***.*** /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu  ‹system›
 ╰─$ pwd                                                                                                                                                              02:32:15
 /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu
 ***@***.*** /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu  ‹system›
 ╰─$ ls libcudnn.so.7                                                                                                                                                 02:32:26
 libcudnn.so.7@

 —
 You are receiving this because you were mentioned.

body:
I think it is the default location for libcudnn.so.7

On Sun, Sep 16, 2018 at 10:39 AM KUROYANAGI KEIICHI <
notifications@github.com> wrote:

> @tedyu <https://github.com/tedyu> @mysticaltech
> <https://github.com/mysticaltech> I found libcudnn.so.7 in
> /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu. Do you know why it will be installed there?
>
> ╭─keiichi.kuroyanagi@instance-1 /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu  ‹system›
> ╰─$ pwd                                                                                                                                                              02:32:15
> /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu
> ╭─keiichi.kuroyanagi@instance-1 /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu  ‹system›
> ╰─$ ls libcudnn.so.7                                                                                                                                                 02:32:26
> libcudnn.so.7@
>
> —
> You are receiving this because you were mentioned.
> Reply to this email directly, view it on GitHub
> <https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/issues/20271#issuecomment-421801384>,
> or mute the thread
> <https://github.com/notifications/unsubscribe-auth/AAOWtNTsLo9DifdiT9ocNr2OKt42hZ0Nks5ubozmgaJpZM4U12Cl>
> .
